item.title: Magic Mirror Dashboard
item.author: fabianmolina@stanford.edu (Fabian Molina)
item.description: Project Description: In this project, I designed and built a “Magic Mirror” dashboard that functions as both a smart display and a mirror. Using a Raspberry Pi, I set up the mirror to display essential information, like the time, weather, and calendar events, on a TV monitor with a reflective film.
